title: Bug 17289: Combo doesn't take focus by clicking on it (Photon)
description: When clicking on the first Combo, it does not take focus.
OB: Clicking on the first Combo does not change the focus caret's position.
EB: The focus caret should be moved to the first Combo after clicking on it.
SR: To reproduce the issue, open the 'Add a new CVS Repository' dialog. Then, press the 'Tab' key, and observe that the focus is transferred to the second Combo 'Repository Path:'.
